panels.description: Status of cluster in DR, Primary, Secondary or undefined
panels.title: vault-nonprod DR Status
Last DR and remote DR WAL indexes from both clusters over time

panels.description: Status of cluster in DR, Primary, Secondary or undefined
panels.title: vault-nonprod-dr DR Status

panels.description: Either the last DR WAL index of the primary or the last index from the primary the secondary cluster wrote. Metric only collected on vault-nonprod cluster nodes.
panels.title: vault-nonprod DR WAL INDEX

panels.description: Either the last DR WAL index of the primary or the last index from the primary the secondary cluster wrote. Metric only collected on ${datasource} cluster nodes.
panels.title: vault-nonprod-dr DR WAL INDEX

panels.description: The last WAL index of the primary cluster. Metric only collected on vault-nonprod cluster nodes.
panels.title: vault-nonprod WAL INDEX

panels.description: The last WAL index written. Metric only collected on vault-nonprod-dr cluster nodes.
panels.title: vault-nonprod-dr WAL INDEX

panels.description: Average time to login (ms)
panels.title: Average Login Time

panels.description: Average core and log request handlers
panels.title: Requests (req/s)

panels.description: Number of Leases across namespaces
panels.title: Leases

panels.title: Authentication Rate

panels.description: Number of KV Engines across namespaces
panels.title: KV Engines

panels.description: Token Count by Namespace
panels.title: Tokens by Namespace

panels.description: Token Lookup Rate
panels.title: Token Lookups

panels.description: Any count greater than zero means that Vault experienced a leadership change.
panels.title: Vault Leadership Lost Count

panels.description: Last reported Vault and Raft leader node
panels.title: Current Leader

panels.description: Increments whenever raft server starts an election. If there are frequent elections or leadership changes, it would likely indicate network issues between the raft nodes, or that the raft servers themselves are unable to keep up with the load.
panels.title: Vault Raft Leader Elections

panels.description: Measures the time since the leader was last able to contact the follower nodes when checking its leader lease
panels.title: Raft Leader Last Contact (ms)

panels.description: Number of Vault cluster leadership setup failures. Failures indicate bad overall cluster leadership status.
panels.title: Vault Leadership Setup Failures

panels.description: Number of times node has entered the follower mode. This happens when a new node joins the cluster or after the end of a leader election.
panels.title: Raft Follower State Entered Count

panels.description: Performance of Raft Integrated Storage Backend
panels.title: Storage Performance (ms)

panels.description: Sum of time spent to perform actions on the storage
panels.title: Time Spent (ms)
